name: Vial of Blessed Water
description: Holy water purified in sacred rites, radiating a serene and divine luminescence.

id: Vial of Dew Collected at Dawn
name: Vial of Dew Collected at Dawn
description: Dew harvested at the break of day, glowing with the first light and morning’s essence.

name: Vial of Infernal Oil
description: Oil infused with infernal energies, radiating a dark and potent aura of power.

name: Vial of Molten Lava
description: Molten lava captured and contained, swirling with the untamed fury of the earth’s core.

name: Vial of Moonlit Dew
description: Dew collected under the silver gaze of the moon, shimmering with lunar mystique.

name: Vial of Pure Sunlight
description: Sunlight captured at dawn, glowing with the first light of day and untapped potential.

name: Vial of Radiant Essence
description: A concentrated essence of radiant magic, shimmering with the promise of luminous power.

name: Vial of Storm Essence
description: Essence harnessed from the heart of a storm, crackling with the energy of raging tempests.

name: Vial of Enchanted Sap
description: Sap drawn from ancient, enchanted trees, pulsating with the lifeforce of mystical flora.

name: Vial of Pure Spring Water
description: Water from a pristine spring, infused with the untouched purity of nature’s embrace.

name: Vial of Dark Essence
description: A vial filled with dark essence, pulsating with the mysterious energy of the abyss.

name: Vial of Dragonfire
description: Captured dragonfire, flickering with ancient flames and the might of legendary beasts.

name: Vial of Life Essence
description: Essence captured from the very breath of life, pulsating with vibrant and potent energy.

name: Vial of Magical Essence
description: A vial containing raw magical essence, glowing with untamed and versatile arcane power.

name: Vial of Night Oil
description: Oil infused with the essence of night, dark and shimmering with shadowed enchantment.

name: Vial of Pure Flame Essence
description: Essence of untainted flame, glowing with the pure, relentless power of eternal fire.

name: Vial of Pure Illusion Essence
description: Essence harvested from the realm of illusions, swirling with deceptive and mystical energies.
